title: For Now I Know in Part - A Visit with David Bentley Hart
description:
Julian and David Bentley Hart talk about many topics including Beauty, Natural Law, the radical message of the NT, American Christianity, Donald Trump, Gnosticism, and Theodicy. 

Links: 
DBH as Prophet: https://www.firstthings.com/web-exclusives/2011/05/a-person-you-flee-at-parties
DBH on Christian Communists: https://www.nytimes.com/2017/11/04/opinion/sunday/christianity-communism.html
Roland in Moonlight: https://www.angelicopress.org/roland-in-moonlight-hart
Julian piece on Private Possesions: https://coffeewithkierkgaard.home.blog/2021/07/12/christ-and-possessions/
